main.name: Nawaf Bocay
main.description: Instructor at day time. Web Developer at night time.
main.bio: My name is Nawaf also known as Neo, I'm a ReactJS Developer. Currently I'm a freelancer. I love computer games and sports such as basketball, soccer and karate. My main sport is karate. I am also a fellow Triskelion of TAU GAMMA PHI.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: He can develop Desktop and Web App. For desktop app he uses Java and React JS for Web app. He can also do Vector art and video editing. He also do coaching for begginers

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology Major in Database Systems
education.description: Graduated with College Service and Team Sports Awardee

work.title: Teacher
work.description: Teaching HTML, CSS, Javascript and Java programming, and multimedia tools such as Adobe Photoshop and Powerdirector and explaining how much impact does ICT in the society to thousands of students.

work.title: Instructor
work.description: Teaching computer courses such as Programming, Multimedia Techniques and Database Management to engineering, IT and Senior high students.

work.title: Enumerator
work.description: Provided encoding skills in the registration of IDP's and returnees of Marawi City through SCOPE App.

work.title: Technical Support && Web Developer
work.description: Provided technical support as well as developing a human resource management system for the company.

testimonials.text: During our college days, Nawaf and I collaborated with school projects and freelance work while studying. We did create projects for Human Interface Course and helped each other out with our respective Capstone Project. We also had a chance to do freelancing as a student. I must say, he is a good developer. Even though we had very limited resources he still finished his responsibilities
testimonials.user: Amer Hussien Macatotong - Instructor in College of Information Technology

testimonials.text: He is fast in compeleting his task. He is also loved by his students with his easy going and good personality.
testimonials.user: Mohammad Domato - Instructor in College of Information Technology

testimonials.text: When I worked with him, he's job was only an enumerator but the team lacks of technical support. Some of the team members aren't familliar with the devices especially with the app. So I told him to step up coz he is our IT guy and he did it so well.
testimonials.user: Joseph Philip Conlu - Team Leader in World Food Programme
